meta.name: Description
meta.content: Elementary & Middle Schools with 3 Locations: K-8 School Central and East Mesa, Phoenix and Glendale AZ. / Self Development Academy is Ranked #1 Best Elementary School in Arizona 2017 / #2 Charter Elementary School in America 2017 / #1 Elementary Teachers Arizona 2018 / #1 Public Middle School Teachers America 2017 & 2018.

div.p: COVID-19 UPDATE: SCHOOLS CLOSED for the remainder of the school year. Learning materials and Online learning available. Please Note: Self Development Preschool's Daycare Program remains open Monday-Friday 5:45am-6:00pm

div.h2: Making a better tomorrow. One child at a time.
div.p: Every child sculpted by proper nurturing and a demanding curriculum can grow up to electrify the world.
#1 Best Elementary School in Arizona
Our self-confident scholars dedicate themselves to bettering the world.
#2 Best Charter Elementary School in America
Our award winning STEAM program combines the essentials of analysis with the essentials of humanity.
#1 Best K-8 Teachers in Arizona

Self Development Academy is recognized nationally as a top ranked K-8 charter schools located in Mesa Arizona. Founded in 2000, Self Development charter school offers an accelerated curriculum, tailored to the strengths of individual students. We have an award winning math and science program. In addition, our stellar arts and gifted programs ensure that all of our students are challenged to excel in every endeavor.
We offer High School level Algebra II to our 7th and 8th grade students.
By 8th grade, all students will complete 1 year of High School Chemistry & Physics.
Students wide range of performing arts options including: dance, choir, percussion, violin, woodwinds.
Since opening Self Development charter school has the distinction of receiving state and nation-wide awards.

li.span: Best Charter Elementary School in America 2017
Best Elementary School Teachers in Arizona 2018
Best Public Middle School Teachers in America 2017, 2018

div.p: Self Development Academy was the perfect beginning to my education, teaching me how to write well and seek further advancement in mathematics. It prepared me to do well and high school and was a key factor toward getting into Princeton University for college.
Former Student, currently attending Princeton

div.h2: Latest Blog From Our AZ Schools

div.p: This weird trick with a mint turns anxiety into serenity. Find out how in this new blog post!

Summer is a great time to take the focus off of academics and leave kids free to play and develop on their own. As parents, there are several ways we can encourage and inspire our children to grow their creativity.

Summer is a great time to rest, enjoy a change of pace and schedule, and evaluate the schoolyear we just finished in preparation for the one around the corner. Consider these questions and engage your student in the process as you plan for the upcoming schoolyear

div.h1: About Self Development Academy - Arizona's Best Charter Schools! Now In Phoenix, Central and East Mesa, & Glendale
div.p: The best charter schools in Mesa, Phoenix, & Glendale Arizona, Self Development Academy (SDA) curriculum is rooted in the philosophy that every child has a learning style that works best for them. We then identify those different learning styles that resonate with each child so that student can learn more successfully. We use a rigorous International Cambridge curriculum model that challenges our students and prepares them for successful high school and college careers. Linking effort with achievement, trying new concepts and appreciating abilities is the platform of our mastery learning approach.

The curriculum at both our top K-8 Phoenix and Mesa charter schools teach one grade-level above Arizona Department of Education standards and employs a combination of strategies to enhance learning and inspire life-long learning. Self Development Academy's unique approach to education focuses on integrating new, research-based information with traditionally upheld views that have withstood the tests of time.
In addition to our Mesa and Phoenix, Arizona charter schools, we are proud to be opening two new AZ locations, one in East Mesa and one in Glendale AZ. Give us a call and enroll your child today!
div.h3: Motivating Arizona's SDA Charter School Students
div.p: The success of the rigorous academic program at SDA is attributed to the passion, care, and pedagogical acumen of the classroom teachers. Teachers make learning fun and achievable, motivating students to achieve high goals. The mastery learning approach affirms that all children can learn.

Our mastery learning approach encourages students to try new concepts, appreciate their abilities, and link effort with achievement.The school uses a highly rigorous curriculum comparable to the International Cambridge model to challenge students and prepare them for high school, college, career, and life beyond.

The curriculum of our Arizona schools is aligned to standards set by the Arizona Department of Education, teaching one grade level above those standards. The challenging curriculum is distinctively designed to reach and connect with all types of learners, using a combination of strategies to enhance learning and inspire. Our unique approach to education focuses on the increasingly important integration of new, research-based knowledge with traditionally upheld views that have withstood the tests of time. This has led to us being ranked as one of the best elementary schools in Arizona and top charter schools in Phoenix and Mesa AZ. We are nationally ranked in the top 10.

Self Development Academy-Phoenix:Self Development Academy-MesaNotice of Public Meetings Pursuant to A.R.S. 38-431.02, Self Development Charter School dba Self Development Academy [Mesa] shall physically post notice of its governing board meetings, committee meetings, and subcommittee meetings on the bulletin board of the front office in its education building located at 1721 N. Greenfield Rd., Mesa, AZ 85205. Self Development Academy - Phoenix shall physically post notice of its governing board meetings, committee meetings, and subcommittee meetings on the bulletin board of the front office in its education building located at 1721 N, Greenfield Road, Mesa, AZ. Self Development Scottsdale Academy shall physically post notice of its governing board meetings, committee meetings, and subcommittee meetings on the bulletin board of the front office in its education building located at 1721 N, Greenfield Road, Mesa, AZ. Self Development Eastmark Academy shall physically post notice of its governing board meetings, committee meetings, and subcommittee meetings on the bulletin board of the front office in its education building located at 1721 N, Greenfield Road, Mesa, AZ. Additionally, Self Development Charter School dba Self Development Academy [Mesa], Self Development Academy – Phoenix, Self Development Scottsdale Academy, and Self Development Eastmark Academy shall additionally post notice on this website. Locations are open to the public Monday through Friday from 8 AM to 5 PM. Such notices shall indicate the date, time, and place of the meeting and include an agenda or information on how the public may obtain an agenda for the meeting.
